scripts.build:cordova: astro build && node scripts/fix-cordova-paths.js && node scripts/move-assets.js && copy cordova-config.xml www\config.xml
scripts.prepare:android: cd www && npx cordova prepare android
scripts.preview:cordova: copy cordova-config.xml www\config.xml && npx http-server www -p 8000 -o
scripts.cordova:add:web: cd www && npx cordova platform add browser
scripts.cordova:add:android: cd www && npx cordova platform add android
scripts.cordova:requirements: cd www && npx cordova requirements android
scripts.cordova:clean:android: cd www && npx cordova clean android
scripts.cordova:run:web: copy cordova-config.xml www\config.xml && npx http-server www -p 8000 -o
scripts.cordova:build:web: npm run build && cd www && npx cordova build browser
scripts.cordova:build:android: npm run build:cordova && cd www && npx cordova prepare android && npx cordova build android && cd .. && adb install -r platforms\android\app\build\outputs\apk\debug\app-debug.apk && adb shell monkey -p com.utnc.justificantes -c android.intent.category.LAUNCHER 1
scripts.cordova:build:android:release: npm run build:cordova && cd www && npx cordova prepare android && npx cordova build android --release
scripts.cordova:run:android: npm run build:cordova && cd www && npx cordova prepare android && npx cordova run android
scripts.cordova:install:android: adb install -r platforms\android\app\build\outputs\apk\debug\app-debug.apk && adb shell monkey -p com.utnc.justificantes -c android.intent.category.LAUNCHER 1
